A booke of ayres, set foorth to be song to the lute, orpherian, and base violl, by Philip Rosseter lutenist: and are to be solde at his house in Fleetstreete neere to the Grayhound Rosseter, Philip, 1567 or 8-1623. Campion, Thomas, 1567-1620. aut
[48] p. : music
Printed by Peter Short, by the assent of Thomas Morley, At Lonond [sic] : 1601.
Signatures: A-M² . The first 21 songs are by Thomas Campion. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
